_source.text: 3. Colorado - Senator Michael Bennet is not an incumbent in the traditional sense (he was appointed to the post), and both appointed Senators Bob Menendez and Roger Wicker were among the incumbents who performed significantly better than the average of polls between January and June indicated.

text: who performed significantly **better** **than** the average of polls between January and June indicated.
3. Colorado - **Senator** Michael Bennet is not an incumbent in the traditional sense (he was appointed
to the post), and both appointed Senators Bob Menendez and **Roger** Wicker were among the incumbents
